tool.name: Remove strain/gene to cg/wgMLST database
tool.command: cp '${database}' '${databaseout}' && wgMLST remove #if $element == "strain" --strains #else --genes #end if #if $data.input == "textinput" '${databaseout}' #for $strain in $data.textelement.split(" ") '$strain' #end for #else -f '${data.fileelement}' '${databaseout}' #end if #if $log 2> '${logfile}' #end if

param.name: element
param.label: Select type of data to remove

param.name: textelement
param.label: Name of strain/gene to removed from database
param.help: Separated each strain/gene by a space and quote it

param.name: fileelement
param.label: File list of strain/gene to removed

tool.help:
**What it does**
Remove STRAINS or GENES from a cg/wgMLST DATABASE.
You can indicated the STRAIN or GENE to remove: - Typing element separated by space - Using a file containing these elements
**Options:** --strains / --genes Choose the item you wish to remove -f, --file FILENAME File list of genes or strains to removed on the wgMLST database.
